title: A molecular garbage disposal complex has a role in packing the genome

title_detail.value: A molecular garbage disposal complex has a role in packing the genome

summary: New research has found that the proteasome, an essential protein complex that breaks down proteins in cells, has another unexpected function: directly regulating the packing of DNA in the nucleus.

summary_detail.value: New research has found that the proteasome, an essential protein complex that breaks down proteins in cells, has another unexpected function: directly regulating the packing of DNA in the nucleus.
